description: This file defines the main frontend component for a chat application, including layout, authentication handling, login panel, and integration of child components like Sidebar, Header, and ChatArea.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main component that wraps the application with an authentication provider and displays the page layout.

methods.name: PageLayout
methods.description: Handles rendering different views based on user authentication state, including loading, login, or main chat layout.

methods.name: LoginPanel
methods.description: Provides the login form with email and password fields, and handles sign-in process.
